Load in tidy csvs
```{r}
psp2017_tidy <- read_csv("data/csv/psp_tidy.csv")
psp2013_tidy <- read_csv("data/csv/psp2013_tidy.csv")
psp2010_tidy <- read_csv("data/csv/psp2010_tidy.csv")
```



Assign parties to speakers
```{r}
unn_c <- read_csv("data/csv/unn.csv") %>%
  group_by(rowname) %>%
  summarise(text_c = str_c(word, collapse = " "))


```
